ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I have to join in a social situation with a large group of boys and girls (more than 6)
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I am with other boys and girls or adults and I become the center of attention (they all look at me).
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I am with other boys and girls or adults and I have to do something while they watch me (read aloud, play a game, play a sport).
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I have to speak or read in front of a group of people.
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when answering questions in class or at meetings (scouts, soccer team) even when I know the answer.
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel so nervous at parties, dances, schoool, or anyplace where there will be more than two other people that I go home early.
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I meet new kids.
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I am too nervous to ask questions in class.
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I am in the school cafeteria with boys or girls my age that I know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I am in the school cafeteria with boys or girls my age that I don't know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous when I am in the school cafeteria with adults
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody starts arguing with me, I feel nervous and do not know what to do if that person is a boy or girl my age that I know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody starts arguing with me, I feel nervous and do not know what to do if that person is a boy or girl my age that I don't know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody starts arguing with me, I feel nervous and do not know what to do if that person is an adult
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody asks me to do something that I don't want to do, I feel nervous and don't know what to say if that person is a boy or girl my age that I know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody asks me to do something that I don't want to do, I feel nervous and don't know what to say if that person is a boy or girl my age that I don't know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: If somebody asks me to do something that I don't want to do, I feel nervous and don't know what to say if that person is an adult
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous and don't know what to do when in an embarrassing situation with a boy or girl my age that I know (embarrassed means that your face gets hot and red)
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: I feel nervous and don't know what to do when in an embarrassing situation with a boy or girl my age that I don't know (embarrassed means that your face gets hot and red)

Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: Somebody says something that I think is wrong or bad, I feel nervous saying what I think if that person is a boy or girl my age that I know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: Somebody says something that I think is wrong or bad, I feel nervous saying what I think if that person is a boy or girl my age that I don't know
Notes: 0 = Never or hardly ever; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Most of the time or always; -9 = Incomplete

ElementDescription: Somebody says something that I think is wrong or bad, I feel nervous saying what I think if that person is an adult
